note.p: Daughter of Christopher Peek, farmer, of Wiggenhall St Mary the Virgin, Norfolk, and his wife Anne. Living with her parents at Tilney St Lawrence, Norfolk, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1830/8/8), 1881 (RG11/1698/102/4)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2021)
Norfolk Church of England registers (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2021)
